name: Iron Bundle
author: Oswaldo KATO
flavor_text: It resembles a mysterious object mentioned in an old book. There are only two reported sightings of this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Hyper Blower
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is on your Bench, you may switch out your opponent’s Active Pokémon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.) If you do, discard this Pokémon and all attached cards.

attacks.name: Refrigerated Stream
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is an Evolution Pokémon, it can’t attack during your opponent’s next turn.
